gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Kings 117, Hawks 110
gameRecap.excerpt: The Kings outscored the Hawks 31-19 in the 4th quarter and defeat Atlanta 117-110. DeAaron Fox led Sacramento with 31 points (13 in 4th quarter), six rebounds, and eight assists as Domantas Sabonis added 25 points, 10 rebounds, and seven assists. Trae Young had 24 points and nine assists for Atlanta as Jalen Johnson added 16 points and a career-high 15 rebounds. Sacramento improves to 18-12 as Atlanta moves to 12-19.
